articles.title: A $2M schoolhouse near the Berkshires lists for the first time in over three decades
articles.description:
Deep in the bucolic Litchfield County section of Connecticut, you’ll find the small town of Salisbury. It’s a picturesque hideaway just a couple miles from the Massachusetts border that’s home to the Taconic School House, now on the market for $1.995 million. Sitting on a rolling 2.92-acre property, 552 Twin Lakes Road is a three-bed, […]
